answers.answer: HI,Delay in healing process is affected by various factors. Tissue handling at the time of surgery, presence of anaemia, diabetes etc also delay the healing. Also as there is tenderness and pain at the site of incision, you should consult your Doctor before using any abdominal belts.Hope this helps.
